tool.name: Concatenate queries
tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
**WARNING:** Be careful not to concatenate queries of different kinds (e.g., sequences with intervals). This tool does not check if the two queries being concatenated are in the same format.
-----
**What it does**
Concatenates two queries
-----
**Example**
Query1::
chrX 151087187 151087355 A 0 - chrX 151572400 151572481 B 0 +
Query2::
chr1 151242630 151242955 X 0 + chr1 151271715 151271999 Y 0 + chr1 151278832 151279227 Z 0 -
The result of concatenation is::
chrX 151087187 151087355 A 0 - chrX 151572400 151572481 B 0 + chr1 151242630 151242955 X 0 + chr1 151271715 151271999 Y 0 + chr1 151278832 151279227 Z 0 -
